bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for AC Generator Protection
IEEE Guide for AC Generator Protection

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: In this IEEE standard a review of the generally accepted forms of relay protection for the synchronous generator and its excitation system is presented. This guide is primarily concerned with protection against faults and abnormal operating conditions for large hydraulic, steam, and combustion-turbine generators.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.102-2006 (Revison of IEEE Std C37.102-1995)
IEEE Std C37.102-2006 (Revison of IEEE Std C37.102-1995)
